amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the definition of "Federal Intergovernmental Mandate" in the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act to make clear that it applies to Medicaid and other large entitlement programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of May 12, 1998, to clarify that the definition of "federal intergovernmenmtal mandates," as drafted under the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act, was specifi cally intended to include Medicaid and other large entitlement programs, as well as efforts to impose new Medicaid mandates without new flexibility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (VA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
